dcterms:creator: A. Tann
X. J. Han
S. S. Gupta
Y. S. Ong
dcterms:description: A dataset containing smart contract data sourced from Google BigQuery, which has been preprocessed to remove false positives and labeled into five different vulnerability categories: Suicidal, Prodigal, Greedy, Normal, and a composite category of Prodigal and Greedy.
dcterms:title: Smart Contract Data from Tann et al.
